WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is bad data from the Armory, we can't do anything about it. Try submitting a ticket to Blizzard.
WorkItem.Description: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=33593 (old badge cloak from BC) is showing near the top of the list due to all it's armor being considered real armor instead of bonus armor.  If you refresh from Wowhead it is fixed but....tons of items are messed up in the current item cache this way.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Bonus armor from Armory broken, wrong values

Comments.Message: Repeatable:  Refresh from armory causes this.  Refresh from wowhead works around the issue.
that's bad data on the armory website (im like 99% sure)
"tons of items" meaning the BC +armor cloaks, and that's it, right? So like, 4-5 items?
